title: League Can't connect
body: Everything is fine when I'm in champion select. When select is over, I wait for the loading screen, but instead I get a black screen and it says it can't connect to servers. I would have to restart my client and reconnect in order to to get into the loading screen. Is there a way to fix this so I can just connect. Over the years of playing this only has happened to me recently.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time establishing a solid connection to the game server. Most of the time, this is caused by local network settings that cause an unstable link to the server. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to connect.
